[[tabview]]
[[tab PROFILE]]
[[<]]
**Badge ID:** 148810
**Clearance Level:** 4-A
**Sites:** 19, 64, 43
**Name:** JayKillbam
**Age:** 35
**Height:** 170cm
**Eye Color:** Blue

**History:**
JayKillbam joined the SCP Foundation as entry level staff in March 2020. While he did make some attempts early on to move up the ranks without feedback from his peers, JayKillbam soon realized the necessity of community within the Organization. JayKillbam made his first foray into Foundation graces with CupidCon submission [[[stardust| Stardust]]]. Other research soon followed. Now an active member of Site-19, JayKillbam contributes in his limited capacity to Anomalous Research.

As of July 2021, JayKillbam has been given the opportunity to work alongside MAST in the tagging department as Junior Staff.

As of September 2022, JayKillbam has stepped down form MAST duties due to negligible contributions and low activity.  He was thankful for his chance to assist, but continues to focus on research.  

As of August 2024, Researcher Jaykillbam is considered AWOL, due to his lack of communication with the Foundation. Current investigation as well as speculation has revealed that Jaykillbam may be creating his own alternate timeline using ulterior methods. Extant data can be gleaned by what is found in the researcher’s Lab. 

**Education:**
Bachelor’s in Music Composition
Trained Somaliër  
Master Mixologist
Arm Chair Physicist 
Tenured Psychonaut
Memelord

**Personal Activities:**
In his off time, away from Foundation related experiments, JayKillbam moonlights as a luxury hotel bar manager. He enjoys watching Youtube. JayKillbam also is known to have a small addiction to dry-aged steaks and indulges in this pastime every chance he gets. He has a cat named “Lil’ Man”.
[[/<]]

[[tab Future Projects]]
[[<]]
**The Eyes Of God**
A painting that drives people insane, painted in blood, and a large investigation. 

**The Event at Summerwood Lake**
A girl summons a plague upon a park as revenge. 

**Left Turn**
A liberal car that has alignment issues and always steers left.

**The Island:** A WL entry about a man who takes a short vacation to a summer island in the dead of winter, while consuming hallucinogenics he gets in way over his head when he starts asking locals about island folklore.
